bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.description:
Describe the bug Report from a Harvester user. He gets the following message: <denchmark-code>UnicodeEncodeError: 'charmap' codec can't encode character '\ufeff' </denchmark-code>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....' See error
Expected behavior UnicodeEncodeError should not be raised. Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: Windows Python: Unknown Harvester: Unkown GenTL Producer: Active Silicon Camera: Optronis
Additional context None.
